title: VMAC Writes
content: VMac Writes is hosted on Wordpress.com and has more than 100 blog posts. From Cloud to AI to Gaming.

title: Medium
content: Interesting and important technical thoughts are posted here for your reference. Clap if you like and also check my claps. #AI #ML

title: DZone
content: DZone Most Valuable Blogger | A collection of my technical articles. Catering Cloud, Cognitive, and many more...

title: For Performant Serverless Swift actions…
content: This tutorial goes through the steps of setting up the server side of an iOS mobile app with Swift, including the code and commands for the project.

title: Personifying Chatbots: A Guide to Realistic Conversation
content: If you want your chatbot to pass the Turing Test, it needs to be personified and personalized. Luckily, that's not *too* difficult to do!

title: My High Sierra Story...
content: Disclaimer: This post is just to help macOS users who are facing installation failures or stuck while installing/upgrading to High Sierra.

title: Love Kubernetes?? Now, manage your containers with it on IBM Cloud Container Service
content: This post helps you in getting started with Kubernetes on IBM Cloud via CLI. After a post on how to get started with Docker Containers on IBM Cloud, the next destination was to play with container orchestration on IBM Cloud.

title: A Voice-enabled ChatBot powered by IBM Watson in Mins
content: WatBot is a Voice-enabled Android Native ChatBot built using Watson Conversation, Speech-to-Text and Text-to-Speech Services on IBM Cloud (open standards cloud platform for building, running, and managing apps and services).

title: Speaker Recognition With Watson Speech-to-Text API
content: Learn how to take advantage of IBM Watson’s speaker diarization feature, which distinguishes between speakers in real time.
